name: Nedjem
description: The cat of Puimre, second priest of Amun during the reign of Queen Hatshepsut. Depicted on a damaged relief from Puimre's tomb, Nedjem is the earliest known cat to bear an individual name.

name: Cheshire Cat
description: The Cheshire Cat is a character from Lewis Carroll's 'Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.' He is known for his mischievous grin and ability to disappear and reappear at will.
quirk: The Cheshire Cat can speak in riddles and often confuses those he encounters.

name: Bagheera
description: Bagheera is a sleek black panther and a character from Rudyard Kipling's 'The Jungle Book.' He is wise and protective of Mowgli, the story's protagonist.
catchphrase: I'm always watching over you, little one.

name: Shere Khan
description: Shere Khan is a fearsome Bengal tiger and the main antagonist in Rudyard Kipling's 'The Jungle Book.' He is known for his cunning nature and desire to hunt Mowgli.
catchphrase: I will have my prey, one way or another.

name: Felix the Cat
description: Felix the Cat is one of the oldest and most recognizable cartoon characters. He is a black and white cat known for his mischievous nature and ability to shape-shift.

name: Tigger
description: Tigger is a bouncy tiger character from A.A. Milne's 'Winnie-the-Pooh' stories. He has a cheerful and energetic personality and loves to bounce on his tail.
quirk: Hi loves to bounce and pounce on everything.

name: Simba
description: Simba is the main character in Disney's 'The Lion King.' While not a domestic cat, Simba is a courageous lion cub who embarks on a journey to reclaim his kingdom.

name: Félicette
description: Félicette was a French stray cat who became the first and only cat to be launched into space. On October 18, 1963, she reached an altitude of about 97 miles  aboard the French Véronique AGI sounding rocket.
